*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Report ZAPLINK_REFRESH_SOTR *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& *& *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT zaplink_refresh_sotr.
TABLES: sotr_head, sotr_use. TYPE-POOLS: abap.
SELECT-OPTIONS: s_objn FOR sotr_use-obj_name, s_devc FOR sotr_head-paket. PARAMETERS f_test TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true.
INITIALIZATION. DATA _objn LIKE LINE OF s_objn[]. DATA _devc LIKE LINE OF s_devc[].
_objn-sign = 'I'. _objn-option = 'CP'. _objn-low = 'Z*'. APPEND _objn TO s_objn.
_devc-sign = 'I'. _devc-option = 'CP'. _devc-low = 'Z*'. APPEND _devc TO s_devc. _devc-sign = 'I'. _devc-option = 'EQ'. _devc-low = '$TMP'. APPEND _devc TO s_devc.
START-OF-SELECTION. TYPES: BEGIN OF ts_extract. INCLUDE TYPE sotr_use AS s_use. TYPES: concept_ TYPE sotr_head-concept, clsname TYPE seoclass-clsname, END OF ts_extract. TYPES tt_extract TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ts_extract WITH DEFAULT KEY.
DATA t_extract TYPE tt_extract. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <e> LIKE LINE OF t_extract. DATA t_del TYPE sotr_use_tt. DATA msg TYPE string.
SELECT u~pgmid u~object u~obj_name u~concept u~lfd_num h~concept u~obj_name INTO TABLE t_extract FROM sotr_use AS u LEFT JOIN sotr_head AS h ON h~concept = u~concept WHERE u~pgmid = 'LIMU' AND u~object = 'CPUB' AND u~obj_name IN s_objn.
* Add to delete SOTR without header LOOP AT t_extract ASSIGNING <e> WHERE concept_ IS INITIAL. WRITE:/ <e>-obj_name,<e>-concept. APPEND <e>-s_use TO t_del. ENDLOOP.
WRITE:/ sy-uline.
SELECT u~pgmid u~object u~obj_name u~concept u~lfd_num h~concept c~clsname INTO TABLE t_extract FROM sotr_use AS u INNER JOIN sotr_head AS h ON h~concept = u~concept LEFT JOIN seoclass AS c ON c~clsname = u~obj_name WHERE u~pgmid = 'LIMU' AND u~object = 'CPUB' AND u~obj_name IN s_objn AND h~paket IN s_devc.
* Add to delete SOTR without class DELETE t_extract WHERE NOT clsname IS INITIAL. LOOP AT t_extract ASSIGNING <e>. WRITE:/ <e>-obj_name,<e>-concept. APPEND <e>-s_use TO t_del. ENDLOOP.
IF f_test IS INITIAL. CALL FUNCTION 'SOTR_USAGE_DELETE' EXPORTING sotr_usage = t_del.
LOOP AT t_extract ASSIGNING <e>. CALL FUNCTION 'SOTR_DELETE_CONCEPT' EXPORTING concept = <e>-concept * IN_UPDATE_TASK = * FLAG_CHECK_USAGE = * FLAG_CHECK_AUTHORITY = * FLAG_CHECK_MASTER = * LANGU = SY-LANGU * FLAG_CORRECTION_ENTRY = * IMPORTING * FLAG_CANCELLED = EXCEPTIONS no_authorization = 1 no_entry_found = 2 concept_used = 3 no_master_language = 4 no_source_system = 5 no_tadir_entry = 6 error_in_correction = 7 user_cancelled = 8 text_not_found = 9 invalid_package = 10 text_not_changeable = 11 text_enqueued = 12 no_correction = 13 parameter_error = 14 OTHERS = 15 . IF sy-subrc <> 0. MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4 INTO msg. WRITE:/ <e>-concept, <e>-obj_name, sy-subrc, msg. ENDIF.
ENDLOOP. ENDIF.
